topic.title: Sample: Relationship table
topic.shortdesc: This sample shows a relationship table that maps tasks to their supporting concepts and referenced details, and a group that associates two topics outside the table. It can be found with accompanying content in samples\typedmaps\source\rels.ditamap

body.codeblock: <map title="Relationship map"> <reltable> <relheader> <relcolspec type="concept"/> <relcolspec type="task"/> <relcolspec type="reference" linking="targetonly"/> </relheader> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Maps" href="concepts/maps.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Creating maps" href="tasks/create.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="map element" href="ref/map.dita" linking="normal"/> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Maps" href="concepts/maps.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Starting maps" href="tasks/start.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="topicref element" href="ref/topicref.dita"/> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Topic references" href="concepts/topicrefs.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="Nested references" href="concepts/nesting.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Adding topic references" href="tasks/addref.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="topicref element" href="ref/topicref.dita" linking="normal"> </topicref> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Topic references" href="concepts/topicrefs.dita" linking="targetonly"> </topicref> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Adding simple references" href="tasks/addsimp.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="topicref element" href="ref/topicref.dita"/> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Topic references" href="concepts/topicrefs.dita" linking="targetonly"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Scope" href="concepts/scope.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Adding external references" href="tasks/addext.dita"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Adding peer references" href="tasks/addpeer.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="topicref element" href="ref/topicref.dita"/> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Topic references" href="concepts/topicrefs.dita" linking="targetonly"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="Format" href="concepts/format.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Adding non-DITA references" href="tasks/addnon.dita"> </topicref> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="topicref element" href="ref/topicref.dita"/> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref </relcell> <relcell linking="normal"> <topicref navtitle="topicref element" href="ref/topicref.dita" linking="targetonly"> </topicref> <topicref navtitle="topicmeta element" href="ref/topicmeta.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="linktext element" href="ref/linktext.dita"/> <topicref navtitle="shortdesc element" href="ref/shortdesc.dita"/> </relcell> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Collection types" href="concepts/colltype.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Defining collection types" href="tasks/definecoll.dita"> </topicref> </relcell> <relcell/> </relrow> <relrow> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Sequences" href="concepts/sequences.dita"/> </relcell> <relcell> <topicref navtitle="Defining sequences" href="tasks/defseq.dita"/> href="tasks/addnon.dita"> </topicref> </topicref>
